version_description: Faster, leaner, and cleaner—this complete rebuild makes Stashing better than ever. To start, we’ve got a completely new portfolio screen for you. It’s now easier to understand where your money is and how it’s doing. Also, we’re replacing some terms. “Stas

Faster, leaner, and cleaner—this complete rebuild makes Stashing better than ever. To start, we’ve got a completely new portfolio screen for you. It’s now easier to understand where your money is and how it’s doing. Also, we’re replacing some terms. “Stas

Happy New Year Stashers!
We’ve got a gift for all you iPhone X users: You can now use Apple’s Face ID to securely log in to Stash with just a glance. Face ID uses the state-of-the-art TrueDepth camera system with advanced technologies to accurately map

Happy New Year! To celebrate 2018, we’re giving new users in January chances to win $2,018 by sending referrals. We’ve also made Smart-Save even smarter. You can now set a checking minimum to automatically stop Smart-Save transfers when your checking bala

Happy New Year! To celebrate 2018, we’re giving new users in January chances to win $2,018 by sending referrals. We’ve also made Smart-Save even smarter. You can now set a checking minimum to automatically stop Smart-Save transfers when your checking bala
This update, we’ve made some experience improvements to bank linking, Smart-Save, and the activity feed. Per usual, we also snuffed out a bunch of bugs. As always, thanks for being a part of Stash.
This update, we’ve made some experience improvements to bank linking, Smart-Save, and the activity feed. Per usual, we also snuffed out a bunch of bugs. As always, thanks for being a part of Stash.

Today, we’re introducing a new account type—custodial accounts. Now, you can open an investing account as a gift for anyone under 18. You can manage custodial accounts just like you manage your Invest and Retire accounts. We’ve also made some experience i

Today, we’re introducing a new account type—custodial accounts. Now, you can open an investing account as a gift for anyone under 18. You can manage custodial accounts just like you manage your Invest and Retire accounts. We’ve also made some experience i
This update, we have made some experience improvements to custodial accounts and snuffed out a bunch of bugs. As always, thanks for being a part of Stash.
This update, we have made some experience improvements to custodial accounts and snuffed out a bunch of bugs. As always, thanks for being a part of Stash.

This update is all 'bout bashin' bugs. Look for things to be smoother than ever. And per usual it's been a pleasure...

Way to Kill Bugs #125: Grab your Jumbo Ultrasonic Frequency Emitter (JUFE) available at your local Bug Bashin' store. Plug it in.

Way to Kill Bugs #125: Grab your Jumbo Ultrasonic Frequency Emitter (JUFE) available at your local Bug Bashin' store. Plug it in.

Another strong update all about bugs. We hate 'em. So we terminate them.
